description: You can greet new users and assign them roles.

commands.set greetNewbies <true|false>: Activates or deactivates greeting of the new member in your server.

commands.set greetChannel <channel-name>: The channels where the new members should be greeted

commands.set greetText <text>: The greet message. use {server} to insert the server-name, {user} to tag the new user and #<channel-name> to link a channel.

commands.set privateMessage <text>: The greet message. use {server} to insert the server-name and {user} to tag the new user.

commands.set leaveChannel <channel-name>: The channels where the bot should say goodbye.
